reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 37/97: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY OF MINISTER TO CITY OF ORILLIA
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY OF MINISTER TO CITY OF ORILLIA
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister's authority to give approval under section 51 of the let continued, as it existed immediately prior to March 28, 1995, by section 74.1 of the Act with respect to applications for approval of plans of subdivision whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule is delegated to the council of the City of Orillia. O. Reg. 37/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Minister's authority to give approval under section 51 of the let continued, as it existed immediately prior to March 28, 1995, by section 74.1 of the Act with respect to applications for approval of plans of subdivision whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule is delegated to the council of the City of Orillia. O. Reg. 37/97, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under section 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 37/97, s. 2 (1). (2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 37/97, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under section 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 37/97, s. 2 (1).

(2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 37/97, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 37/97, s. 3. SCHEDULE   FILE NUMBERS OF APPLICATIONS FOR APPROVAL OF PLANS OF SUBDIVISION 43T-90043 43T-90023 43T-87022 43T-75295 43T-74158 O. Reg. 37/97, Sched.
